reviewText: I watched this show when i was a kid and i loved it. I bought this for my kids and they love thw show as much as i do. I highly recommend this dvd!
i put this in my nephews easter basket. he loves the fraggles. we watch this over and over. he dances with them and tries to sing also. he is almost 2.

Recently, I was clearing my parents house out and found a box of old toys, including a bunch of Fraggle dolls that I had as a kid. When I mentioned this to my sister, she said she heard that Fraggles were making a comeback with a new movie coming out. Sure enough, when I checked Amazon, the complete series was available. It was such a joy to see this again. This is a great show for kids (or nostalgic adults). The puppetry is great. The show is very musical, but the songs (by and large) aren't corny or annoying. Some of them are actually a bit tender. The episodes often deal with themes like prejudice and the environment. That being said, I'd recommend getting the newer Fraggle Rock: Complete Series Collection DVD set. It has the complete series (as opposed to just a few episodes as on this product). For the price, it's a steal. I hope you enjoy your time "down in Fraggle Rock"!

Down in Fraggle Rock, things move in a pleasurable life style. You seem to always expect the best and usually get it! Maybe thats what we all need now. If you want to show your, "Stressed Out- Hyper Active", kids some good fun, then share this DVD with them. My friends, and even my adult kids, started singing,"Dance Your Cares Away".... So come on Down in Fraggle Rock and join the fun its great from 6 months to 160!
